trans-unit.source: Role based access control provides you a way to apply granular level policy administration down to individual resources or resource groups.
trans-unit.target: Role based access control provides you a way to apply granular level policy administration down to individual resources or resource groups.

trans-unit.source: These APIs allow you to manage role definitions and role assignments.
trans-unit.target: These APIs allow you to manage role definitions and role assignments.

trans-unit.source: A role definition describes the set of actions that can be performed on resources and role assignments grant access to Azure AD users and services by assigning role definitions to resources.
trans-unit.target: A role definition describes the set of actions that can be performed on resources and role assignments grant access to Azure AD users and services by assigning role definitions to resources.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <externalLink><linkText>Role-based access control in Azure Preview portal</linkText><linkUri>http://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/articles/role-based-access-control-configure/</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <externalLink><linkText>Role-based access control in Azure Preview portal</linkText><linkUri>http://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/articles/role-based-access-control-configure/</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: The following information is common to all tasks that you might do related to role-based access control:
trans-unit.target: The following information is common to all tasks that you might do related to role-based access control:

trans-unit.source: Replace {subscription-id} with your subscription identifier in the URI.
trans-unit.target: Replace {subscription-id} with your subscription identifier in the URI.

trans-unit.source: Set the <parameterReference>Authorization</parameterReference> header to a JSON Web Token that you obtain from Azure Active Directory.
trans-unit.target: Set the <parameterReference>Authorization</parameterReference> header to a JSON Web Token that you obtain from Azure Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="a1caa0f7-3250-46ed-95b5-8603d902383b" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authenticating Azure Resource Manager requests</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="a1caa0f7-3250-46ed-95b5-8603d902383b" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authenticating Azure Resource Manager requests</link>.
